search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for CASEpeer (casepeer.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for CASEpeer appears to be: [https://www.casepeer.com/pricing](https://www.casepeer.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: CASEpeer Pricing | Book a Demo Today!

extracted_content.content:
Built for Personal Injury Firms.  
Simple, Predictable Pricing.
---------------------------------------------------------------

   ![Image 1: trust badges](https://res.cloudinary.com/spiralyze/image/upload/f_auto/casepeer/4003/desktop_badges.webp)

Not sure which plan you need?
-----------------------------

Get a demo and explore features, plans, and pricing options.

Email address

get a demo

*   ### **Basic**
    
*   ### **Pro**
    
*   ### **Advanced**
    

|  | 
### **Basic**

Set a foundation for your personal injury law firm.



 | 

### **Pro**

Drive your growth with data-backed decisions.



 | 

### **Advanced**

Scale with confidence with all of CASEpeer's features.

[LEARN MORE](https://www.casepeer.com/tier-advanced)



 |
